goal: Execute a series of tasks including terraform modifications, AWS operations, and file management

steps.name: Step 1
steps.prompt: Modify the terraform code to use the region us-west-1 instead of us-east-1

steps.name: New Step

steps.name: New Step 2
steps.prompt: retrieve the relevant methods for aws to get ec2 intances .

steps.name: New Step 3

steps.name: New Step 4
